name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Sales Engineer with a strong foundation in **Cloud Security**, **Cybersecurity**, and **Value Selling**, complemented by over 13 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer. Proven expertise in presenting and demonstrating technical solutions that align with client needs, leveraging skills in **Account Planning** and **Territory Planning**. Skilled in cutting-edge technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in building and deploying applications using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Experience in delivering AI/ML-driven applications across industries, with capabilities in **CI/CD pipelines** and **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong background in MLOps, allowing for effective communication of technical concepts and solutions. Deep understanding of compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring security and regulatory adherence in all proposed solutions.
